availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin C. Canifax (Carter County, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Risa R. Duncan Canifax in Carter County, Kentucky, on March 23, 1848. Father of James A. Duncan, Amanda J. Duncan, Malinda B. Duncan, and Pamelia Duncan. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Mount Pleasant, p. 199-200.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carter County Marriages, Film #001759301, p. 42-43.
